item.description:
The tranquil little town of Waldstedt am See is in shock. A murder has taken place! While solving the case a family drama unravels that puzzles the investigators. Hence, the public prosecutor decides to hand the case over to you, students of the police academy, to help solve the mysterious murder case. You will have to investigate as a team, examine evidence and analyse interrogations. Who is responsible for the murder? Who is innocent? Find the clues and solve the case!

As a team (or solo if that’s your thing) you will have to investigate all police documents, determine the murder weapon, unseal sealed documents, interrogate persons of interest, corroborate their alibis and find the culprit who killen the old and wealthy leady Mrs. Edith Krause. Your investigations will take place in a multimedia environment - just as real investigative work! You will receive a police file and sealed record as hard copies and will need to use your laptop or mobile phone to log into the digital records of the crime case. Here you will be able to talk to persons of interest, the public prosecutor of Waldstedt am See and answer questions to your ongoing investigation.

The murder mystery investigation will take you approximately 90 to 180 minutes. Due to the sealed document, which you first need to unseal, you can easily split your crime investigation into two evenings and continue the next day - no problem!

The murder mystery case investigation is suitable for children from the age of 12 years and above. We recommend the help of adults and to not leave children to their own devices, they will/might need assistance. The investigation is primarily aimed at adults.


Im beschaulichen Städtchen Waldstedt am See wird es spannend. Ein Mord ist geschehen! Bei der Aufklärung des Falls entspinnt sich ein Familiendrama, welches die Ermittler:innen vor ein Rätsel stellt. Aus diesem Grund beschließt die Staatsanwaltschaft, Euch, die Studierenden der Polizeiakademie, als neue Ermittler zu Rate zu ziehen. Ermittelt gemeinsam, untersucht die Asservate und analysiert die Verhöre. Wer hat den Mord begangen? Und wer ist unschuldig? Findet die Beweise und klärt den Fall!

—description from the publisher
